summary: An ordinance providing for the reconstruction and extension of the King Street sewer outfall; for the reconstruction and extension of the main sewers on 6th Avenue South, between King and Weller Streets, and on 5th Avenue South between Jackson and King Streets; for the extension and repair of 110 feet of 24" overflow sewer to connect with the manhole on Fairview Avenue North to discharge into Lake Union at the street end; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund therefor and declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriation.
